bibl.title: Sullivan v. Marsh. Defendant Statement for the Judge
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Whitman} ss
In David Marsh, Sheriff of Whitman County Washington Territory. Greeting
In the name of the United States

You are hereby commander of that you have the body of Dan. Sullivan by you unprisoned and detained as it is said together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and detention by whatever name the said Dan Sullivan shall be called or charged before the Hon. S.C. Wingard Judge of the District Court of Washington Territory and for the First Judicial District thereof holding terms at Colfax in and for Whitman County forthwith upon the receipt of this writ to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said Dan Sullivan and have you then and there this writ
Witness the Hon S.C. Wingard Judge of said
